page.title: 18Redcar Folk Festival
page.content:
The 17th Annual Redcar Folk Festival, a gathering of Folk musicians, dancers and people who just enjoy Folk Music, took place between 12th-14th July in and around the Redcar Bowl.
It was thought by many that the line- up this year was the best for many a year. Those appearing included Martin Carthy and Tony Rose, Rab Noakes, Gary and Vera Aspey and the Kipper Family. The dancers were headed by a group of Irish dancers, Clan na Gael, together with traditional Morris Dancing and Sword Dancing.
As well as the concerts, workshops and ceildhs many felt that the best part of the weekend was the frequency of informal "sing arounds" in the local pubs.
